A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Absolutely terrible Star Wars entry. Even from a non-Star Wars perspective there are so many plot holes it may as well have been called swiss cheese. The humor is not even remotely funny and detracts from the movie itself. The \"twists\" are hardly twists and more of an unnecessary build up to a pointless 5 second dismissal. I understand now why Mark Hamill had a problem with the way Rian Johnson portrayed Luke Skywalker. The force is not with this movie.
